message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth, which I believe aligns perfectly with your interests and needs. Given its significance, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000 for the product. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, providing you with a substantial return on your investment while allowing us to recoup our costs and secure a fair profit. Please consider this proposal carefully and let me know if you would like to proceed. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
